document.title: Changing texts display
document.paragraph:
By modifying EiffelStudio
../../reference/85_preferences/00_introduction.xml preferences , you can change the font and the colors used to display texts in the editor. For more information, refer to EiffelStudio
../../reference/85_preferences/eiffelstudio/20_interface/index.xml graphical preferences reference .
